definition: to leak/to divulge/to leave out by mistake/waterclock or hourglass (old)

sentences.english: Peristaltic pump filling, high precision, no drop, easy to clean, no pollution.
sentences.chinese: 蠕動泵灌裝，精度高，無滴漏，易於清洗。

sentences.english: Water must not drip continuously from vent.
sentences.chinese: 從排氣口處必須沒有水持續滴漏。

sentences.english: Sanitary pans should be continuous throughout the entire phosphate and electrocoat system.
sentences.chinese: 滴漏盤要連續走，隨磷化和電泳生產線。

sentences.english: If water drips continuously from vent, second check is leaking.
sentences.chinese: 如果水從排氣口持續滴漏，則第二止回閥泄漏。

sentences.english: This results in the nasal stuffiness , sneezing and mucous discharge of allergic rhinitis.
sentences.chinese: 這一結果在鼻滴漏，打噴嚏和粘液放電的過敏性鼻炎。

sentences.english: After glass blowing was invented the hourglass came into use.
sentences.chinese: 吹制玻璃術發明後，滴漏計時器便開始使用。

sentences.english: Using advanced anti-leaking technology to keep the liquid from leaking when the filling is not working.
sentences.chinese: 採用先進的防滴漏技術，防止在不灌裝時液體滴漏。

sentences.english: Using advanced anti-leaking technology to keep the liquid from leaking when the filling is not working.
sentences.chinese: 採用先進的防滴漏技術，防止在不灌裝時液體滴漏。

sentences.english: The teacher repeated the process touching another drop of leakage to her tongue.
sentences.chinese: 老師又用舌頭嚐了一滴漏出來的東西。

sentences.english: Chiksan sections in high pressure lines should be watched for leaks.
sentences.chinese: 要注意觀察高壓管線的活動彎頭是否有滴漏。

sentences.english: Like an unending dropping on a day of rain is a bitter-tongued woman.
sentences.chinese: 大雨之日連連滴漏，和爭吵的婦人一樣。

sentences.english: The steam valve of main engine fresh water heater leaked.
sentences.chinese: 主機淡水加熱器的蒸氣閥有滴漏。

sentences.english: Finally it can be used to cover overhead conveyor casings, or even line the conveyor drip trays.
sentences.chinese: 還可以覆蓋傳送架上部，或固定盛滴漏的盤子。

sentences.english: Objective To observe the therapeutic effect of integrative medicine therapy(IMT) on postnasal drip syndrome.
sentences.chinese: 目的探索治療多涕所致鼻後滴漏綜合徵的有效方法。

sentences.english: A continual dropping in a very rainy day and a contentious woman are alike.
sentences.chinese: 大雨之日連連滴漏，和爭吵的婦人一樣。

sentences.english: Filling head adopts anti-leakage and lifting device.
sentences.chinese: 灌裝悶頭採用防滴漏及升降灌裝裝置。

definition: oil spill/oil leak/(fig.) boo! (opposite of 加油[jia1 you2])
water spot/water stain/wet spot/damp patch/water damage
to leak/to divulge/to leave out by mistake/waterclock or hourglass (old)
to flow backwards (of water, because of flood, tide, wind etc)/reverse flow/to back up (sewage)
